text: Yue Xin (; born ) is a Chinese student activist and graduate from Peking University who disappeared on 23 August 2018. BBC News described Yue as one of China's most influential left-wing activists of 2018. A Marxist and feminist, she was known for her advocacy of labour and women's rights prior to her disappearance. ==references== Category:Chinese human rights activists Category:1990s births Category:Missing people
title: Yue Xin
